definition: outstanding/particularly, especially/a fault/to express discontentment against
diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]

sentences.english: And Marchisio similar can be said of today's armed forces Yongming Juventus.
sentences.chinese: 與馬爾基西奧類似，今天的尤文圖斯可謂三軍用命。

sentences.english: Juventus have decided to lodge an appeal against the three-match ban handed out to David Trezeguet.
sentences.chinese: 尤文圖斯爲特雷澤蓋停賽三場提出了上訴。

sentences.english: Parma are in negotiations with Juventus for defender Jean Alain Boumsong.
sentences.chinese: 帕爾馬正和尤文圖斯就布姆松轉會一案進行談判。

sentences.english: Juventus are considering an offer from Genoa for attacking midfielder Fabrizio Miccoli.
sentences.chinese: 尤文圖斯正在考慮熱那亞對前鋒米科利的出價。

sentences.english: It would be a great signing for Juventus.
sentences.chinese: 這對尤文圖斯來說將是一筆出色的引援。

sentences.english: Juventus are resisting offers for winger Marco Marchionni.
sentences.chinese: 尤文圖斯正在抗拒對邊翼馬爾基奧尼的出價。

sentences.english: Juventus defender Jean Alain Boumsong is attracting interest from Liverpool.
sentences.chinese: 尤文圖斯後衛布姆松吸引到了利物浦的興趣。

sentences.english: By which he is referring to the transfer of defender Andrea Barzagli to the Bianconeri.
sentences.chinese: 在這裏他指的是巴爾扎利去尤文圖斯的轉會。

sentences.english: The Club World Cup champions cannot possibly reply to the newly-promoted Juventus.
sentences.chinese: 世俱杯冠軍也許無法回擊升班馬尤文圖斯。

sentences.english: The striker gave an interview in which he talked about the Juventus "school".
sentences.chinese: 這名前鋒球員在接受採訪時談到了“尤文圖斯學校”。

sentences.english: The relationship between Juventus and Pavel Nedved is about to come to an end.
sentences.chinese: 尤文圖斯與帕維爾內德維德之間的關係就要結束了。

sentences.english: And Lech Poznan did well in their group to qualify ahead of Juventus.
sentences.chinese: 萊克普斯納也不錯，在小組裏力壓尤文圖斯而晉級。

sentences.english: The Bianconeri can also help me to win back my place in the Selecao.
sentences.chinese: 尤文圖斯可以幫我在巴西國家隊贏得一席之地。

sentences.english: Juventus starlet Raffaele Palladino has pledged his future to the Bianconeri.
sentences.chinese: 尤文圖斯的希望之星已經保證他的將來就在斑馬軍團。

sentences.english: Michele Paolucci was on the fringes of the Juventus team at that stage, playing for the youth team.
sentences.chinese: 保盧奇當時正在尤文圖斯一線隊和青年隊之間徘徊。

sentences.english: This season he’ll get €3.8m from just Juventus.
sentences.chinese: 這個賽季僅僅從尤文圖斯他就可以拿到380萬歐。
